Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: People across Australia are struggling to keep up with rising living costs as inflation rates exceed the Reserve Bank target. While the rate of increase has slowed in recent months this trend is set to persist with certain expenses increasing at an alarming pace. Housing and rental prices remain a significant financial burden for many Australians with Qlders being hit the hardest. Moves to provide assistance via government subsidies increased jobseeker payments and stock market investments may offer some relief in the future. However significant challenges remain as the cost of living continues to rise.
